title: Badger Teemo,Recon Teemo,Elf Teemo
body: So look i know everyone hates a teemo main but hey i love him and i dont have any skins for him and the one i love the most is badger teemo and i cant i just cant seem to get it out of chests and if any riot worker could make my year and let me know if this december he will go on sale just pls and ty{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
Hey there! 

These skins will certainly make a return, but we can't see too far in the future. However, there's some good news! We post monthly sales, so you can see what the upcoming month will have in store for you. Unfortunately, the [October schedule](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/october-sales-schedule) doesn't have any Teemo skins in it. D: But! Elf Teemo will likely come back during the Christmas season. ^-^
Elf Teemo should reappear in the store this December (not sure on sale though), and the rest can only be gotten from Chests.
